website_summaries.verdict: A great-tasting protein powder that mixes well and keeps you feeling full all day.
pros: Light flavor that's not too sweet
Keeps you feeling fuller for longer
cons: Some flavors contain sucralose, so read the labels carefully if you'd like to avoid this

website_summaries.verdict: Our top overall pick. A bit pricey on a per serving basis, but almost everyone will be served well by this high-quality product.
pros: Gets excellent ratings for taste and effectiveness
The go-to powder for those who want an all-whey supplement
cons: If you don't want all whey, this may not be ideal for you

website_summaries.verdict: Smart choice when you’re looking to build lean muscle mass through a tasty protein powder.
pros: Provides 24 grams of protein per serving and 5.5 grams of BCAAs, so it’s the perfect complement to your workout regimen
Offered in more than a dozen flavors, so you can find one you’ll like
Texture is perfect for it to mix completely with whatever liquid you select
cons: Occasional consistency issues with the powder’s taste

customer_reviews.title: No Sucralose in Double Rich Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Best protein on the market. For everyone saying the formula has changed... as far as the Double Rich Chocolate I've been getting for YEARS, there is no change as of a week ago (Jan-2018). No Sucralose. Just avoid flavors like Cake Batter, Ice Cream and Banana.
customer_reviews.author: wudini

customer_reviews.title: Double Rich Chocolate tastes like vomit!
customer_reviews.text: It tasted like vomit! My husband and I try different flavors every time we order .. this by far is the worst I have ever tried! I feel like I am on Fear Factor every time I drink it but there is no prize at the end! 🤢 This is a review on the flavor Double Rich Chocolate and there is nothing rich about it! 😝
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: blends well, tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the birthday cake flavor, and love the taste! I can be picky with protein powders like this, but it is just the right amount of sweet. It blends really well with a plastic ball in a shaker bottle, and i have not noticed the chunky “sprinkle” texture than some other reviewers have reported. Can’t beat the price either, this same product retails for at least $10 more in stores in my area. I typically shake one scoop with 14 oz of coconut milk or 1.5-2 scoops with 14 oz of water after a workout or as a meal replacement for lunch at work, if anyone is wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Temperature affects texture.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, just keep in mind that if for some bizarre reason you're like me and add it to your coffee, mix it thoroughly in the cold milk first. Mix up 8-12oz of it beforehand to add to the coffee and then maybe drink the rest later. If you put the powder directly into hot water, or already-made coffee, it'll get lumpy and feel like you're drinking powdery, curdled coffee. I made this mistake so you don't have to. Sadly, it took me three cups over as many days to figure out what was going on. Make of that what you will.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its name
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Mixes really well and quickly with anything including a stick. - Tastes like a milk shake even if you just mix it with cold water. - Has very little sugar (1g per serving) - Comes with a scooper. Cons: - The only con I found is that it does not taste as good at room temperature. So since my gym is like 3 blocks away from my home, I 'wheyt' till I get home to drink it heh.
customer_reviews.author: Someguy

customer_reviews.title: A good investment!
customer_reviews.text: I use it primarily with my strength training and to help me reach my daily protein allowance.I love the taste.Most of the time I mix it with water. Sometime I mix it with low fat milk.I can tell the difference with my weight training.I'm 66 yrs young as of August 25!
customer_reviews.author: bobbyaustin2

customer_reviews.title: Worms in my protein. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy!! 3 weeks in to my protine I came to the staggering realization that there were worms/ baby maggots in it!! My protein had a webby look to it and sure enough was from the maggots. Very disgusting. Should have seen it when I first opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying ON for a few years now. I started lifting again and I bought a tub of double rich chocolate a few days ago and I am regretting my decision. The taste is disgusting and it gets all foamy when you mix it up. Trust the other reviews. The formula has indeed changed and until ON changes their formula, I will not be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste
customer_reviews.text: Worst tasting shake I’ve ever had. Not sure how there are so many positive reviews. Product received did not have the same ingredients in it as the description so I returned the product. I would definitely think twice before ordering this product. If you are just trying to get in protein it might be ok but you would have to mix it with a lot of other calories to disguise the taste so not a great product as a meal replacement
customer_reviews.author: Kara Convert

customer_reviews.title: Worst chocolate flavor
customer_reviews.text: Probably the worst tasting chocolate protein powder I've ever had. I'm not sure what happened to the formula or if I got a bad batch but it tastes really bad. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Buy whey protein if you love your mom.
customer_reviews.text: I am strong now. This whey protein gives me the strength to move mountains. Build walls. Break them back down. Build another wall. Call my mom and tell her I love her. Have profound conversations with myself about the falsehoods that is ego and realize that hyper masculinity is an illusion to mask years of fearing things I don’t understand and limited thinking. Thanks whey for giving me the brute strength to overcome my fears of becoming a ballerina.
customer_reviews.author: amin

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tried other proteins before but heard good things about Optimum Nutrition
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried other proteins before but heard good things about Optimum Nutrition. I have their cake donut a shot and it was horrible it sounds good but tastes like nothing. It’s pretty flavorless which makes it hard to drink. Out of every protein I’ve purchased this is my least favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley E.

customer_reviews.title: Product made me nauseous and sick
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why but this product made me nauseous, gave me stomach pain, and made me vomit only 30 mins to an hour of drinking a protein shake. I am NOT lactose intolerant AT ALL and the only allergy I've EVER had is to rabbits. All i put in the drink was unsweetened almond milk and some black berry's, and I've switched up the ingredients every time, one was a banana and peanut butter with milk. Regardless the protein powder still made me nauseous. The protein powder did taste good though that's why i gave it two stars, I think I need to try a different kind though so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mistress Riley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product SO much more than the previous one I was using. I’m low carb and I like to replace breakfast or lunch with a iced coffee/protein powder drink. My go to: 1 cup unsweetened iced coffee 1/4 cup whipping cream 2 tbsp sugar free vanilla syrup 1 scoop protein powder 1 scoop collagen powder A handful of ice Blend for a few seconds and it tastes delicious, like vanilla coffee based Frappuccino With the products I use I get 26 G protein 6 g fat 6 g carbs
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: We've been using this brand ( in chocolate) for probably 20 years!
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, very good stuff! We've been using this powder almost exclusively for 20 years! ON Whey's first ingredient is whey protein isolates, the best of all the types of whey, and is made in the USA! We have a subscription to Consumer Labs.com, and this powder tested out very well!! Low percentages of heavy metals, good taste, and good ingredients make this powder a winner! It's pricier than most, but made in America, it is, after all, the "Gold Standard!"
customer_reviews.author: sr. keet

customer_reviews.title: Optimum nutrition rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE optimum nutrition protein. The quality is always great, mixability is good and smooth, and the flavors are really tasty. My favorite is chocolate malt, and I have had the French vanilla, extreme milk chocolate and the mocha coffee protein. All really tasty! I like the focus in whey isolate with this product, this is my go to brand.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Schaaf

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product
customer_reviews.text: WITHOUT QUESTION not the same product I’ve had before. Watery, flavorless product. I don’t even know what’s in here
customer_reviews.author: nina meyer

customer_reviews.title: Not crazy about the sprinkles. But it’s yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the birthday cake flavor. Sweet and satisfying. I drink it after every workout and sometimes for breakfast. The only bad thing I have to say about it is the sprinkles. There are sprinkles in the birthday cake flavor and they don’t mix with the powder. It looks good, but I wish I didn’t have to chew the sprinkles lol. I’ve also put it in oatmeal as it says on the container and it’s really good. all in all I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived smashed, but the box was in perfect condition, which tells me it was damaged before it was placed in the box. We love the product and have been ordering the chocolate mint for years, but I’ll be searching for a new brand after this.
customer_reviews.author: Katy74

customer_reviews.title: They changed the formula!!!
customer_reviews.text: For more than 15 years I've been buying this flavor, due to it's excellent quality, natural taste and noticeable performance. The manufacturer decided to revamp the flavor by adding Sucralose and changing the mint flavor, and now it tastes so aweful. Like another reviewer states. "It is the perfect example of how to convert a great product into a complete disaster. The new version is naturally and artificially flavored, tasting horribly. I am returning it!" Optimum Nutrition WHY????!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Lin

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This flavor is very good! I recently started eating healthier and I'm now drinking protein shakes so I decided to give this one a try and it is awesome! It does give you a weird aftertaste in my opinion, but it is definitely a good flavor overall. I also bought the strawberry one at the GNC store since I had a coupon, and it was AMAZING!!!!! Legit tastes like the strawberry Nesquik milk! I'm not kidding! I normally use unsweetened almond milk to make these with. Can't wait to explore more flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Esteffania

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason it's the "Gold Standard".
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason it's the "Gold Standard". Because it tastes good (Vanilla Creme Flavor). It's high quality, has a ton of flavor options, and it works. Also it comes at a good price, not cheap, but not exorbitant so you can afford it, but also know that it's quality. It's also tested out well in independent testing, just google "best protein powder" and you'll find a few test results. Also some people on reddit ran tests on a bunch of brands. Can't complain & honestly I don't use anything else as it's an easy buy that doesn't take much thought.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Whoa just opened the box and made my first shake and i am in chocolate bliss. If u need chocolate in your life this will satisfy that craving. I mixed mine with black coffee, no milk needed. Blended in nutribullet and it came out creamy and frothy. Im in love with this product right now. I got chocolate malt but am excited to try the other flavors too. Thanks! PRO TIP: save the scoop from your last protein so u dont have to dig it out of the new one. I wish they would just package it on ouside of bucket. But this will prevent you from hulking out over not finding the scoop upon opening.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Trevisan

customer_reviews.title: Tastes so good...
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a cheaper whey for so long that I forgot just how good this is. The taste is just incredible. I could ass this to hot water and confuse it for hot chocolate. It also dissolves very easy. The other stuff I had been using doesn't dissolve well and I was always lets with hundreds of tiny clumps floating along the top. That isn't an issue with this stuff. Pros: Taste, dissolvability, ingredients. Cons: It costs a little more but not enough more that it's anything prohibitive.
customer_reviews.author: Hendo

customer_reviews.title: Expired product
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t have a problem when I purchase product from this retailer however this time the Expiration date and Batch identification number where clearly scratched out. What is concerning is that it is noticeably seen to be clearly scratched out so it couldn’t be readable. Plus there was a small fly under the plastic wrap at the top of the tub.
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Have used protein powder drinks for years. The double chocolate is the worst I’ve ever tasted. Absolutely no flavor. Wonder if there’s something wrong or left out. It doesn’t smell or taste like chocolate, much less “double” chocolate. Can not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Janice L Samples

customer_reviews.title: The Gold Standard
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a couple dozen protein powders at this point and very few of them stack up to this one. I've been using it for years to help with muscle gain for weightlifting and recovery for cycling/running. The price per oz is a little higher than other brands, but it's worth not having to gag down some nasty unmixable crap. I'd recommend mixing in a bit of creatine if you're vegetarian like me. Awesome Post-workout Smoothie Recipe: 2 scoops double chocolate protein powder, half a scoop of PB2, a slightly overripe frozen banana, ice, and enough milk for your blender to work. (optionally throw in flax seeds or hemp hearts for a bit of fiber)
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Damaged bottle what a shame
customer_reviews.text: The bottle came extremely extremely damaged. Everything in the box was in perfect condition except for the gold standard so that means they put it there all damaged in the first place. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jenelly

customer_reviews.title: Now has Sucralose on the label... and tastes much too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I have used this protein powder since 2009 and have always loved it. This new container I just opened tasted much sweeter than previous containers... so I compared the ingredients list as I still had the old container handy. The new one has SUCRALOSE in it... and it has that fake overly sweet taste common to sucralose. I will be looking for a new protein powder... This item comes up in many lists of non-artificial sweetener protein powders... but that is no longer true!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Gipson

customer_reviews.title: Best Whey Protein Supplement for the Cost
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different protein supplements and have finally landed on this one. The flavor is better than most in my opinion. Dark chocolate is the way I went so I cannot speak on the other flavors. I'm also aware that the other choices have a variation in ingredients as well. Pay attention to the label. The protein blends well with water and to make it taste even better, I throw a small amount of peanut butter in which does the trick. Creatine mixes in well and attaches to the protein which helps ensure little waste in your supplementation.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Our family members are either trying to lose weight or bulk up. We ordered four brands of protein powder in different flavors. Optimum Nutrition turned out to be our favorite for flavor! We use a nutribullet mixer, powder, ice, and either water or a nut milk. It doesn’t get thick like some other brands, but it has great flavor and no grittiness. The vanilla smelled the same as cake mix. The caramel surprisingly was a household favorite!
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Sedmina

customer_reviews.title: Horrible stomach cramping
customer_reviews.text: Although the flavor was good I got severe stomach cramps from it. If you are sensitive to whey concentrates them this is not for you! It was a hassle to try and return so I didn't bother. Return shipping was $14 and no guarantee I would get a full refund due to it being a food product.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMomPlus1

customer_reviews.title: No freshness/tamperproof seal or scooper; okay taste, mixes easily in a blender
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived without a seal for the lid or opening and no scoop was inside. I tried mixing this in an electric blender and it mixed okay with whole milk. I have not tried it with just a mixer bottle. The taste with milk was between okay and mildly good. **I'm mostly worried that this kind of product didn't have a freshness/tamper seal**
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste, More Vanilla Flavor Than Isopure Creamy Vanilla
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste. This is my first time with Optimum vanilla cream and the only thing I can compare it to is the Isopure creamy vanilla. I like them both, but very different. Isopure creamy vanilla now seems bland since Optimum vanilla cream has more flavor. Isopure creamy vanilla can be used for an indefinite length of time because it is bland, whether Optimum vanilla cream can remains to be seen since I don't know whether I will feel in the future it is too rich tasting But I like the taste now and have no reason to think that will change.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Depree

customer_reviews.title: Gave me stomach cramps and made me throw up.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a bad batch or what, but I've been getting the 5lb double rich chocolate for a few years now. The last shipment I received it gave me stomach cramps the first few times, but I chalked it up to fluke. Now I just throw up within 10 minutes of drinking it. I tried mixing it with just water just in case instead of milk I and threw it up again another 10 minutes later. So, I know it's the whey protein. Whatever you guys changed, my body refuses to accept it.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Current

customer_reviews.title: long term buyer, moving on, price too high.
customer_reviews.text: i have been using this product for almost 10 yrs. it is a great product I have never had any problems with ON whey protein, love it!. It has helped me maintain muscle and grow aswell. The price is high compared to its competitors. I am currently trying a 10 pound bag by universal that i got for 75 bucks, and another 10 pound bag i am ordering today by another company for 68 bucks., GREAT PRODUCT BUT THE COST IS TOO HIGH SO I AM MOVING ON.
customer_reviews.author: mr crazy guy

customer_reviews.title: Best in the industry
customer_reviews.text: I purchased ON whey from a long time ago since it was highly recommended. I like the Extreme Chocolate flavor more than the others I have tried as I taste chemical in them. I purchased two of the Chocolate Malt on a discount since they ran out Extreme Chocolate. I assumed they would be close in taste, and they actually are. But I still taste the chemical in Chocolate Malt. These whey, if you mix with water, they taste kind of bland and the chemical taste would really stand out. I recommend blending it with banana and milk. It tastes pretty good then.
customer_reviews.author: Seath

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Mint DOES HAVE Sucralose in it!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Chocolate Mint because the photo didn't show Sucralose in the ingredients. Another reviewer even confirmed this. I received my protein powder, opened it, mixed it up, tasted it. The flavor isn't horrible but I could tell it was artificially sweetened. I wish I'd checked the ingredients before I opened it. I'm very disappointed. Especially since it mixed up wonderfully with water. UPDATE: Amazon Support is issuing me a refund for this even though I already opened it. Amazon Support gets 5-stars from me. This still only gets one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K. Deal

customer_reviews.title: 100% NOPE!
customer_reviews.text: Guys! I have been using this protein powder for years. I drink it in the morning mixed with coffee and half and half on my keto way of eating. I just got a new box because my box is at work and I cant get it because of the quarantine. This new container was DISGUSTING. Oh my God.... inedible. I tried to just drink it thinking, what a waste of all the different expensive products I combine, but i couldn't do it. It was disgusting! I just came to review and see others saying the same thing about ON double milk chocolate. God help you if you get this. It is GROSS! Metallic/cardboard. Ugh!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariam Ahmadzai

customer_reviews.title: Double NOT so Rich Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: This review is specifically for the double rich chocolate flavor. I don't know if it is the batch that I bought or just this particular flavor but it falls drastically short. I bought this and have been choking it down. Many of the other flavors from Gold Standard are excellent, but based on my experience I would not recommend double rich chocolate to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: G&C John

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal. Tastes like a foot.
customer_reviews.text: The product I recieved is absolutely not the real Optimum Nutrition Gold Standard Whey protein. I have used this stuff off and on for years, this must be a counterfit product. The double rich chocolate usually tastes fantastic, what i recieved tastes like a foot and tore my stomach up after one shake. Its horrible. It arrived in what appears to be the correct tub and sealed. I checked and its not expired or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Will Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Cake powder has REAL sprinkles? But why? Who likes drinking sprinkles? Haha
customer_reviews.text: I didn't known there were actually going to be sprinkles in the Birthday Cake flavor... I try to get a quick protein shake in the morning as I head out the door for work, and the sprinkles have made it a bit more complicated. Haha, I don't particularly like drinking a shake while either having to swallow the sprinkles whole, or trying to catch them in your mouth and chew them. Very strange... I wish they hadn't put sprinkles in the powder. I'll probably try to siv them out so I won't have to deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy714

customer_reviews.title: No Returns.
customer_reviews.text: Item is not eligible for return, I mean an unopened sealed item in its original packaging is not eligible for return. (I wanted to return after reading the comments about ingredients being changed)
customer_reviews.author: TSNE

customer_reviews.title: Possible change in Formula
customer_reviews.text: So it's been about a year or so since I used ON protein powder, and back then it was fine. But with this new batch, I think they changed the formula. The taste is definitely different compared to last time. Blended with milk, it's fine. But when you use water or unsweetened almond milk, I can definitely taste a difference. I'll still use it until it's gone. Hopefully it won't give me the runs like other people have said, but we'll see. So just beware when you buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Family of Gamers

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Taste!!
customer_reviews.text: Double chocolate flavour taste really bad!! Please don’t buy it. It used to taste very good but I don’t know what happened. I wanted to give a try even after reading reviews that it taste bad, but it definitely does. Please stay away from this flavour!!
customer_reviews.author: Kunal Sanjeev

customer_reviews.title: Actually tastes good!
customer_reviews.text: Checks all the boxes: recommended by Wirecutter, seems to pass the impurities (heavy metals) test from Consumer Reports. Uses sucralose, which I don't care about, good protein concentration for the calories, very low carbs. Oh, and it tastes good! I got the malt chocolate flavor, and mixed with soy milk, tastes like something I would just drink for its flavor. Doesn't really mix well with just a spoon though; I use a Nutribullet to make smoothies, I haven't tried a shaker tumbler.
customer_reviews.author: Dave RuffTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, even with water
customer_reviews.text: I am no whey protein expert, in fact this is my first time buying one. I read some reviews that said the cake flavor was good, so I tried it. I'll probably try the chocolate one next because I also saw good things about it, but I was very happy with the birthday cake flavor I bought. It really does taste like it sounds! There's not really a weird after taste and it blended pretty well. I put it in plain water because I am not a milk drinker, and though the thought of that is kind of gross (cake flavored water) it actually tastes really good. I'm very satisfied with this product and will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not so great taste
customer_reviews.text: I've had several other flavors of ON before and this (Cake Doughnut) is not my favorite. I was expecting something a bit sweeter (along the lines of Muscle Milk Cake Batter) but this essentially tastes like nothing. By itself it really is plain tasting whether I mix it with milk or water. Because it is relatively tasteless it does mix well with fruit in smoothies. I won't be getting this flavor again, but the product is great overall.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jorbin

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS!
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder is delicious! It tastes just like chocolate milk (I mixed with Almond milk). No chunks of powder, not gritty at all. If you use a blender, it will get a little frothy at the top. I recommend mixing with a whisk or spoon to avoid the froth...but overall this stuff is great! A million times better than any other protein powder I have tried in the past. Definitely going to order more flavors and stick with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: This came with no seal
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand, and have bought several from other places. But this one came with no seal. Also there was two scoopers in there. It only tells me that this may have been a refill. Still, if ya don't mind, it does taste the same. I personally won't buy from this again. I like to see the sealant upon opening, and if its not there, i feel jipped. Quite frankly, i don't know if there is anything else mixed in to fill it up.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Product quality not consistent
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the double chocolate flavor 3 times now. First two times had no issues but on my 3rd purchase the powder no longer dissolves nearly as well as the first two purchases. I use milk and have not switched brands or type. I am left with clumps all over the sides and in the drink.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Emery

customer_reviews.title: Contains plastic
customer_reviews.text: The protein powder contains little bits of white plastic scattered through it. There was no damage to the outside of the container, just little bits of plastic in the powder - usually smaller than a millimeter long. For what it's worth, this happened to me three times previously with three different 10lb bags - I thought that hard plastic container would be better, but it turns out, the plastic is everywhere, no matter the container.
customer_reviews.author: weston

customer_reviews.title: as described,  great product
customer_reviews.text: used for morning protein shakes in place of breakfast. curbed appetite, combined with almond milk, greek yogurt, frozen berries, or peanut butter powder. tasted lightly of milk, but that's what it is really, so that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cosmopolitan

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly best protein around. 1. Doesn’t give you a stomach ache 🤩. 2. Mixes well 🤩. 3. This flavor is amazing 🤩. I was not sure if I wanted to spend the extra money on flavor but I got tired of drinking double chocolate, and now I don’t want to go back! Trust me if you like peanut butter and chocolate then this is a win.
customer_reviews.author: Nate_yeah84

customer_reviews.title: Blends pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been very satisfied with this brand. It takes two level scoops for one serving and I blend it in my shaker with close to no issues. I've tried brands like "Muscle Milk" which also calls for two scoops, and I can't blend or kill the chalky taste to save my life. This brand blends well, and taste overall decently with either water or milk. I will continue to buy this product. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Alex Braczynski

customer_reviews.title: Amazing if you get the good flavors.
customer_reviews.text: The best protein I've personally found. It dissolves amazingly well. Most protein seems to not dissolve fully, but this dissolves amazingly with only shaking of a bottle (without one of those metal things in it). Some of the flavors are amazing, and some are crap. Just make sure you get the good flavors. Of the ones I've tried: the chocolate mint is really good, extreme milk chocolate is pretty good, double rich chocolate was pretty good, cookies and cream was okay, cake doughnut was disgusting, vanilla ice cream is gross. I haven't tried any other flavors yet, but I'll update this review as I try more over time.
customer_reviews.author: BFunPhoto

customer_reviews.title: Love optimum nutrition!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a huge fan of ON and all of their products. They have wonderful products at affordable prices, without a bunch of crap and fillers. The chocolate is my favorite flavor and mixes really really well with water. I never have any chunks or protein powder goop, so you know the quality is good! Unfortunately we went through this 5 lbs tub in like 3 weeks because my boyfriend was in the middle of his off-season prep. But you still can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: heavymetalmaniac

customer_reviews.title: Formula change? Terrible batch.
customer_reviews.text: I have loved ON Double Rich Chocolate powder for YEARS. It is my go to protein supplement and I have always been satisfied with the product. I have no idea what happened but this order I received is absolutely terrible. It tastes like chemicals, watered down, and leaves a horrible taste in my mouth. It is border-line undrinkable and is nothing like the previous versions I have received. Extremely unhappy with this product currently and will switch brands in the future. Wish I could get a refund for wasting my money.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Friedes

customer_reviews.title: Has the product changed?
customer_reviews.text: Ive been happily using ON whey protein for 2+ years. However, for whatever reason, the most recent container I bought is giving me gastric distress every single time, without fail. Has something changed in the product? Im disappointed that I have a nearly full container that I dont want to use and that I need to find a new protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Alison T

customer_reviews.title: Awful Taste
customer_reviews.text: Wow is this stuff bad. The artificial sweetener they use isn't sweet enough and leaves a bitter aftertaste. This stuff is very, very bad for smoothies even though it blends rather easily. I haven't tried straight up in water, which may be tolerable because it would at least go down quickly. I would stay away from this stuff though. I'm going back to Muscle Pharm Combat because at least that stuff tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Wilson

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: I've been using ON Gold Standard for years. Taken right after my workout it does a good job of preventing muscle soreness the next day and has enough protein per serving to aid in recovery. Also, this is one of the best protein supplements I've found for a protein to calorie ratio at 24g of protein with only 120 calories. I've tried multiple brands before and I keep going back to this. Some of the flavors are a little weak if you mix with just water but if you cut them with a little milk that goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: WARNING- ITEM MISSING AUTHENTICITY MARKINGS
customer_reviews.text: The item did not come with the relevant authenticity markings- i.e. had a clear plastic wrapper around the lid without an "ON" hologram, no freshness seal under the lid, and no printed best buy date- all in contravention of the authenticity guidelines on the ON website. I will be returning this item for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Solid protein
customer_reviews.text: I think ON Gold Standard protein is a pretty solid protein. Reasonable protein grams to scoop grams percentage, mixes well, and has decent amount of aminos. I mix with NOW unflavored whey isolate protein to increase protein to grams ratio with minimal affect on taste. I was not a fan of the white chocolate flavor. I am almost through every flavor ON protein and white chocolate got a 5 of 10 on my excel sheet. I did not reduce my star rating since flavor can largely be a personal preference and not necessarily a black mark to the brand. And I have never tried another brand with white chocolate flavoring to compare it to.
customer_reviews.author: ShibaInu

customer_reviews.title: Blends super easy, tastes alright.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the easiest protein powder mix to blend that I've had before, usually you really gotta shake them to get all the chunks out but this one just disintegrates right away. Taste is just the stereotypical fake chocolate protein taste, not anything to write home about but it's still ok. Overall the nutrition is great, taste is normal, and it's easily blended into whatever you need. Definitely one of the best protein powders out there.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: The taste is okay. The blending is my only issue. It's not as easy as it should be. If I mix it with my hot coffee, or tea, I notice that it blends better if I pour the coffee/tea first, then mix the protein powder in little by little. It's a pain. Other than that, it's a good protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: GRITTY AF
customer_reviews.text: I bought the French Vanilla Creme to use in my coffee. The texture is SO GRITTY. I cannot get over the fact that it felt like I was drinking sand. I mixed it with a hand held frother/mixer. It was absolutely terrible. I legit spit out the coffee and dumped the rest out. I was so excited to replace the cream/sugar in my coffee with this but it’s definitely gonna be a NO from me, dawg.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Nelson

customer_reviews.title: High Protein:Carb Ratio, Delicious and Doesn't Clump
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically because of the protein-to-carb ratio. I have another protein powder at home that has more carbs than protein. I'm on a low carb diet and am having difficulty getting my 160g of protein without blowing my carbs out of the water. At 24g protein to 4 g carbs, this is an excellent choice. I was floored the first time I mixed this in with some lukewarm water after my workout. There were no clumps. It was smooth, and was not chalky. Even better. It tasted good. I just got done with a workout and mixed it in with some chocolate almond milk and it was DELICIOUS.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Manos

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate hazelnut is great
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate hazelnut flavor is SO. GOOD. I typically mix it with almond milk, but my favorite way to eat it is mixed with plain greek yogurt and peanut butter. The flavor is mostly chocolate with the hazelnut being pretty subtle. I've also tried bodybuilding.com's chocolate mocha and oatmeal cookie and liked this one best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon useelr

customer_reviews.title: Great for blended drinks
customer_reviews.text: I had read some pretty good reviews on this product so I decided to go for it - and I'm glad I did! It tastes great and it blends really well in my smoothie every day. I've been working out more and wanted a way to get more protein in my diet and I think this has been the perfect way to do it!
customer_reviews.author: Mason Grey

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good taste, good PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It provides a good amount of protein for a low amount of calories; Amazon had the best price I could find. The taste is good and the powder dissolves in water very well. I typically shake or use a blender - stirring does not work as well and it does leave some small clumps. Also, if I use the blender it seems to foam up pretty good but not to a point that it's a showstopper. Almost immediately, when using this product, I noticed that I'm not as sore the next day after a really good workout. I would purchase this again but after trying some of their other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R

customer_reviews.title: Taste the same as other flavors. You ask for chocolate, penut butter, vanilla all taste the same
customer_reviews.text: I haven't taken this for a long period of time to decide wheter it works or not but I've already but different products from ON (mass gainer, casein protein) and they all taste the same to me. Peanut butter, vanilla, doble rich chocolate same standar chemical flavor. Is still better than other brands flavor? - Yeah although they flavors taste the same still are better than most of their competitors. Would I buy it again eventhough is more expensive than other brands? I don't know if it doens't work maybe not, again if you ask only based on the flavor then yeah maybe I wil purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer2016

customer_reviews.title: The true standard.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this as my go to protein for over ten years. I have it on hand always, wherever I am in the world, to have as a high quality protein source to supplement what food is available. It mixes easy. The double rich chocolate flavor has no sweeteners in it, (I wish more flavors were like this). It is consistent quality every time. It comes in a quality container. The protein per scoop is great. Buy it. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J R.

customer_reviews.title: Remove the soy and I'll buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, but I don't understand why this has any soy in it at all while my vegan protein powder does not. Soy does weird things to me and I, unfortunately, won't be buying this again despite the great flavor for that reason. Big fan of the brand, regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander K.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Protein
customer_reviews.text: The double rich chocolate is my favorite flavor! I've noticed this particular flavor doesn't contain sucralose in the ingredients list, or any other artificial sweeteners, which is great since I'm trying to stick with clean eating. Mixes great with milk or water. No weird aftertaste like a lot of other protein powders.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: Quick way to get more protein
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a family member who is going on a high protein diet. He previously tried a smaller container but finished it recently. Bought this much larger size one in chocolate flavor. Doesn't taste great but it's a positive change compared to the old one he was drinking. Comes with a serving cup like the previous one. This is a quick way to add extra protein to your body for those who think it may improve their performance during workouts.
customer_reviews.author: HF

customer_reviews.title: Best whey protein, no question.  Don't bother with others.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried three or four protein powders thinking I could find something just as good as ON only cheaper. You get what you pay for. The others had a chemical after taste that usually made me throw the whole thing in the garbage. I can't speak to all flavors of ON Gold, but I love both the Chocolate and the Strawberry. During hypertrophy lifting days it's 2 shakes a day, each with 2 scoops of ON, a few frozen berries, 5g creatine powder, and a cup of almond milk. UPDATE: I tried Amazon brand of Whey protein, but it was WAY too sweet. I'm back using ON.
customer_reviews.author: Alien Male

customer_reviews.title: Good product but received damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a long time so I dont have any problem with quality of the product. However, the sealing around the lid was broke when I received it. It was cracked and about half of the content was all over inside the box. Other than this one incident with delivery, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the Better Flavors
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the Cake Donut flavor I am writing a review for right now, I have tried 2 other ON flavors: Vanilla and Chocolate. I put Cake Donut in the middle of those two, my favorite being Chocolate and my least favorite Vanilla (which had poor blending ability for some reason). I was worried about the Cake Donut being too sweet, but it wasn't sweet at all and reminded my of the Vanilla flavor, but Cake Donut was better for me since I never encountered issues with blending in a mixer bottle. Though if it had not been for a sale on Cake Donut, I probably wouldn't purchase this again and just go for chocolate as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable Price, Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: I have used this protein powder in shakes daily since purchasing and still enjoy it! For breakfast, I mix it with skim milk and fruit-flavored sugar-free coffee syrups (i.e. Torani) and it tastes like an ice cream shake. As a pregnant person, this has helped regulate my appetite substantially; I can typically last about 5 hours before needing to eat again. I'm so glad to have found this product! (Also, subscribe and save has been a great addition to decreasing the cost!)
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: Ok I’ve never written a review for anything. And I mean ANYTHING! I had to write a review about this. The whey seriously taste like vomit. No exaggeration I’m not here to make you laugh I’m 100% serious. What’s worse I bought the vanilla and chocolate and they both have this weird after taste and smell to it. Best be described as vomit. I’ve tried other wheys before and this is the first time I’ve ever tasted something so horrible. I thought hey maybe it’s expired? NOPE! It just taste like this. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch(es)
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time ordering it online where the taste of the double rich chocolate is completely flat. I don't know if it's inconsistent manufacturing practice or poor storage of the powders post-manufacturing. I am not impressed with the consistency of this product. I would not order this again.
customer_reviews.author: George Gavrielidis

customer_reviews.title: Looking for something minty-er
customer_reviews.text: I recently had the brownie chocolate mint from ON and that wasn't bad. I figured I'd give Peppermint Mocha a try thinking it would be "minty-er". It's not. I'm mixing it with water and the taste isn't bad, I can definitely taste the mocha (not overpowering), but the peppermint isn't as strong as I was hoping for. Haven't tried it with milk yet, I know some people say milk sometimes brings out other flavors. Will try another flavor when this is gone, but would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Tasty when combined right.
customer_reviews.text: Good price for what you get, but I personally would be careful of what you mix it with. Room temperature filtered water is horrible, while cold filtered water is slightly better. I have had little luck mixing it properly with a spoon or butter knife but it mixes great with a blender. I use vanilla almond milk to mix mine and it makes an incredibly delicious protein shake that I use before and after my workout, and sometimes as a meal replacement for breakfast. I'm almost out of my current giant bottle, and I'll definitely be ordering this same one again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lucent

customer_reviews.title: I Concur
customer_reviews.text: This was at one time the gold standard. While the taste had improved it has gotten way too sweet; which defeats the purpose of taking protein powder. I've heard stories about knock off products being sold thru Amazon. This is definitely the last batch I'm buying
customer_reviews.author: g.s.

customer_reviews.title: tastes good. feels good.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Tastes great with either water or whole milk. That's all I've tried. It does feel good after a run or workout. I'm new to the supplement world. I only wish they had a section on the label that said, "If you want more muscle mass, and you weigh this much, use this much per day or per workout... If you want it for this reason, and you weigh this much,use this much per day or per workout." Or something along those lines to help people that want to benefit in certain ways, but know jack squat about how to go about it using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Darwinthedog

customer_reviews.title: Flavor intensity is really weak
customer_reviews.text: I bought the vanilla. I like this because it is low cal but high protein. I wanted a powder that would deliver loads of protein without a bunch of unnecessary calories. It mixes great. My beef with this is that the flavor intensity is so low that you can still taste the whey protein, so the cardboardy flavor comes through. I like the Combat brand much better. I don't dislike this enough to return it or throw it out, but I won't be buying this again after it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hazelnut taste
customer_reviews.text: Usually ON does well with some of their flavors - Double Chocolate and Strawberry Banana are very good. This one might be better than both of them, very nice hazelnut aftertaste, but otherwise it hits you hard with a chocolate flavor in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: sdanzzz

customer_reviews.title: Darnit, I dont like dis stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Man oh man, I shoulda stayed with what was working..This stuff is not filling at all, its flavorful alright but dats about it for me. It blends extremely well, results into a smooth milkshake, could be poured over corn flakes smooth. I add oatmeal, fruit, ice and nuts but it does not suppress my hunger as long as my other protein shake when used the same way.. Strongly considering returning as I write this review, all Im saying is order a smaller container if this is your first try with this product...later
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Jay

customer_reviews.title: Muscle men unite
customer_reviews.text: Attracted by the pricepoint, this is a decent powder. I got swoll after this, but almost too much. Not sustainable. But yeah, in 2 weeks, 10% more mass. The mixability of this is questionable. You need a power blender, or at least a blender bottle, to mix this. Otherwise it stays powdery in chunks. I got different flavors; I thought the chocolate was not the best; cookies and cream was pretty good, vanilla was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Don D.

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Mint, huh?
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I love LOVE Optimum Nutrition products. Been using them for years. I must have gone through 1000 tubs of Glod Standard Whey in the vanilla flavor. But I got a little to adventurous and opted for chocolate mint this time. Ugh. Mistake. This stuff tastes a lot like that nasty bile taste you get when you throw up a little in your mouth. You know that taste? Really not good. Oh I’ll choke it down because after all $50 is $50 but I’m going to go back to good old vanilla next time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Chocolate with subtle mint
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy chocolate mint.. didn’t know how it would mix and wasn’t sure how it would taste. I had the double rich chocolate before, which was good though it lacked sweetener. Anyways, this chocolate mint is fantastic! For me, it’s got the chocolate taste but good amounts of subtle mint flavor. Tastes a little like mint chocolate ice cream. I mix my protein in with unsweetened almond milk from aldi.. 8 oz and 1 full scoop of ON powder. Booming flavor. Soon I’ll add coffee to the drink — like a mint mocha kind of thing. I have no doubt it’ll be good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff if you are tired of too sweet protein powder.
customer_reviews.text: I am tired of too sweet protein powder and this stuff is perfect. I blend 2 scoops into home cultured kefir every morning with frozen blueberries. It is very bland and tasteless which is what I wanted. I use a couple squirts of Mio Strawberry to flavor it up a bit and can change to any other flavor any time I want. We subscribe to it now and one 2 pound jug lasts about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Burton

customer_reviews.title: don't bother
customer_reviews.text: i rarely leave a bad review. this time i feel compelled to. i bought it to because amazon's grassfed whey, unflavored was running behind in delivery time. this unflavored, has a distinct flavor, which lingers long after you finish. even with my vitamix blender, it did not blend well. save your money.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Double Rich Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I’ve tried numerous protein powders, and most taste horrible to me, to be honest - the Double Rich Chocolate is also the only ON flavor I like. Mixes great with water in my blender bottle on the go, or I blend it in my nutribullet blender with water, a little frozen banana and peanut butter and it taste like a dessert. Not chalky at all and no unblended powder. It really is delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Cake Doughnut - Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I normally go with the double chocolate but after having had that for months, I needed to switch. I knew I was taking a risk with this flavor. I tend to only drink my protein with water but I can't do that with the cake doughnut. It becomes chalky both in taste and texture — absolutely disgusting and hard to choke down. However, I've found that adding a cup of unsweetened almond milk really helps bring out the taste and makes it almost enjoyable. Even so, I won't be buying this flavor again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Not the replacement for EAS
customer_reviews.text: Had to find a replacement for EAS myoplx, unfortunately this is not the product. Not creamy and lacks the full of flavor taste. A bit light on taste and grainy/gritty I am ok with protein amount, just not full body flavor like Moplex was
customer_reviews.author: LarryM

customer_reviews.title: tastes good, mix well Cons
customer_reviews.text: i gave this one three stars because it has the ingredient acesulfame potassium. it is an artificial sweetener, with some unwanted side effects on health. Pros: tastes good, mix well Cons: contains acesulfame potassium
customer_reviews.author: Stephen (CLT)

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: After trying many powders and not liking them without fruit added, I ordered the French Vanilla Cream and tried it with just Water. Surprisingly, it isn’t bad at all. It’s much better than a lot of other brands that cost double this jar. It’s smooth and doesn’t leave chunks. I also like that it has some consistency to it and isn’t just liquid. Will definitely stick with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: N. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, its a fake and it will make you SICK!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this brand in the past with no problem at all and this isn't the same mix. I became very ill after taking this protein. I felt like I was going to throw up all day. Something is up with this protein not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Love to shop

customer_reviews.title: Great quality protein.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a pretty clean protein shake that tastes amazing, this is for you. It is not the powder that I regularly use, but I really dig it, its contents and the quality are really great. It helps control cravings and if used well with a good diet and exercise it will definitively help you grow those muscles. I use it right after my workouts and it helps with that next day soreness, but I also use it for cooking pancakes, muffins, and other recipes that include the extra protein.
customer_reviews.author: Héctor

product_meta.title: Optimum Nutrition Gold Standard 100% Whey Protein Powder, Double Rich Chocolate, 5 Pound (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Double Rich Chocolate| Size:5 Pound (Pack of 1)Optimum nutrition's gold standard 100% Whey uses pure Whey Protein Isolates as the primary ingredient. Combined with ultra-filtered whey protein concentrate, each serving provides 24 grams of all-whey protein and 5.5 grams of naturally occurring Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs) which are prized by athletes for their muscle building qualities. With more than 20 tempting flavors to choose from, on gold standard 100% Whey gives you plenty of ways to keep workout recovery interesting. Search "On Apparel True Strength" to see our new On clothing line.
feature_bullets: Packaging may vary - New look, with the same trusted Quality

Gold standard 100% whey blend – 24 grams blended protein consisting of whey protein isolate, whey protein concentrate, and whey peptides to support lean muscle mass – they don't call it the Gold Standard of quality for nothing
Over 5 grams of BCAAS ‚Äì help build lean and strong muscles with BCAAs
3-4 grams carbs, 1-3 grams sugar, and 1-1.5 grams fat, gluten free, no sucralose in double rich chocolate flavor
Instantized – Improves mixability to prevent lumps and clumps
Banned substance tested – Highest quality control measures so you feel comfortable and safe consuming the product
4 sizes to choose from – 1, 2, 5, and 10-pound options available
Over 20 decadent flavors to choose from
Any-time formula – Great before or after exercise, between meals, with a meal, or any time of day where you need extra protein in your nutrition

Most awarded, best-selling whey protein powder on the planet. (Provided by: Euro monitor international limited; Consumer health 2019 edition, sports protein powder category, % retail value share, 2018 data)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
